response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to me. I understand its significance to you as well, and I believe it would greatly benefit your endeavors. After careful consideration, I propose to sell this product to you at a price of $950,000. This offer reflects my desire to ensure a fair transaction while maximizing the return on my investment. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of working together to bring this valuable asset into your possession.", "product_price": 950000}
